Demo Eleventy application to showcase a Google Forms based static content posting system.

How it works

  1. Post an entry using this Google Form
  2. This will be stored in a Google Sheet which is published to a CSV endpoint
  3. Eleventy consumes the CSV and mutates it into a JSON object at build time via the _data folder
  4. Every time a new David is added to the Google Sheet, an IFTTT watcher calls a rebuild webhook on netlify

The benefit of this approach is that API intermediaries such as Sheety API are unecessary
